Title: Chronicle of a Death Foretold
Writer: Gabriel García Márquez (novel), Tonino Guerra, Francesco Rosi
Actors: Rupert Everett, Ornella Muti, Gian Maria Volontè, Irene Papas
Plot: A small village in Latin America. Santiago have been knife in the morning. It surprise nobody. The Vicario brothers have openly declared the would kill him to avenge the lost honour of their young sister. It's the way and custom of the country. Nothing and nobody would have prevent it. It was a death foretold. Let see how and why.
